Name: Mona
Title: "Astral Reflection" Mona
Desc: Victory or defeat — it has all been written in the stars.
Source: Reward for inviting Mona to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

C112031.Name: Reflection
C112031.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When your active character receives DMG: </color>Decrease DMG taken by 1.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color>. When the Usage is depleted, this card will not be discarded.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Discard this card, deal 1 $[K102].

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

K102.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>
K102.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}Hydro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Vaporize</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro-Charged</color>：DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Frozen</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, the target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives +2 Physical or Pyro DMG)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Bloom</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Dendro Core</color>] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG

C112032.Name: Illusory Bubble
C112032.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When dealing Skill DMG:</color> Remove this status and double the DMG dealt for this instance.

12034.Name: Illusory Torrent
12034.Desc: (Passive) <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you perform "Switch Character" while Mona is your active character:</color> This switch is considered a $[K2] instead of a $[K1]. (Once per Round)

K2.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Fast Action</color>
K2.Desc: You can continue with other actions after conducting 1 Fast Action.\nOnly after conducting 1 Combat Action will the turn pass over to your opponent.

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.
